Text.Page:
Good to see you,

I love doing business. But you know what I hate? Tardiness. It's a small thing, but some of my business associates owe me updated ledgers for recent times.

Can you gently remind them? And I mean it: gently.
Hey, what brings you here?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Jax wants updated ledgers."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Here! Here! By the titans, don't kill me!
I have a family...please. Take it! Take it to Jax and tell him I'll never, ever be late!
Another day in paradise, eh, <PCNAME>?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Jax wants updated ledgers."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
And he sent you to...wait! This doesn't have to end like thisâ€”just let me sign off on it really quickly! It's nearly done!
What can I do for ya?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Jax wants updated ledgers."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Don't hurt me! Not in the face! Look, take the ledger...and tell Jax I'm sorry!

You came back quickly. No troubles, I hope?

Here's a little something for your time.
